alert.note: Alert for Alger (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 3:50AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following county, Alger. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Au Train River is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 340 AM EST, Flooding is occurring in the warned area. - Flooding will continue until the ice jam at the Highway M-28 bridge is cleared. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Au Train. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
